ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14.75 ounce) can wild Alaskan salmon, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Flaxseed meal is an excellent paleo binder that adds omega-3s and structural support
Let the mixture rest for 10 minutes before forming to allow flax to absorb moisture
Pan-fry over medium heat for golden exterior while maintaining moist interior
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how flaxseed meal functions as a paleo-friendly binder and why wild Alaskan salmon offers superior nutrition and flavor to farmed varieties.
